verbs.description: [ARG1: What] to [V: expect] [ARGM-LOC: at this weekend 's state Democratic convention] ? Trump - bashing , down - ticket drama and the coronation of Ned Lamont .
What to expect at this weekend 's state Democratic convention ? [ARG1: Trump] - [V: bashing] , down - ticket drama and the coronation of Ned Lamont .
